table.name: [dbo].[PhotoPSC]
table.remarks: This is the Point Source Catalog.

column.name: [objID]
column.summary: unique identification number for the PSC source

column.name: [ra]
column.summary: right ascension

column.name: [dec]
column.summary: declination

column.name: [cx]
column.summary: Cartesian coordinate x

column.name: [cy]
column.summary: Cartesian coordinate y

column.name: [cz]
column.summary: Cartesian coordinate z

column.name: [htmid]
column.summary: Unique HTM ID

column.name: [zoneid]
column.summary: Zone ID

column.name: [err_maj]
column.summary: major axis of position error ellipse

column.name: [err_min]
column.summary: minor axis of position error ellipse

column.name: [err_ang]
column.summary: position angle of error ellipse major axis

column.name: [designation]
column.summary: source designation formed from sexigesimal coordinates

column.name: [j_m]
column.summary: J default magnitude

column.name: [j_cmsig]
column.summary: J corrected magnitude uncertainty

column.name: [j_msigcom]
column.summary: J total mag uncertainty

column.name: [j_snr]
column.summary: J band scan signal-to-noise ratio

column.name: [h_m]
column.summary: H default magnitude

column.name: [h_cmsig]
column.summary: H corrected magnitude uncertainty

column.name: [h_msigcom]
column.summary: H total mag uncertainty

column.name: [h_snr]
column.summary: H band scan signal-to-noise ratio

column.name: [k_m]
column.summary: K default magnitude

column.name: [k_cmsig]
column.summary: K corrected magnitude uncertainty

column.name: [k_msigcom]
column.summary: K total mag uncertainty

column.name: [k_snr]
column.summary: K band scan signal-to-noise ratio

column.name: [ph_qual]
column.summary: photometric quality flag

column.name: [rd_flg]
column.summary: source of JHK default mags (read flag)

column.name: [bl_flg]
column.summary: indicates no of JHK components fit to source (each digit 0|1|2)

column.name: [cc_flg]
column.summary: indicates artifact contamination and/or confusion

column.name: [ndet]
column.summary: frame detection statistics

column.name: [prox]
column.summary: distance between this source and its nearest neighbor in the PSC

column.name: [pxpa]
column.summary: position angle on the sky of the vector from the source to the nearest neighbor in the PSC

column.name: [pxcntr]
column.summary: pts_key value of the nearest source in the PSC

column.name: [gal_contam]
column.summary: indicates src associated with or contaminated by an ext. src

column.name: [mp_flg]
column.summary: source is positionally associated with an asteroid or comet

column.name: [hemis]
column.summary: hemisphere (N/S) of observation

column.name: [date]
column.summary: observation date

column.name: [scan]
column.summary: scan number (unique within date)

column.name: [glon]
column.summary: galactic longitude, rounded to 0.001 deg

column.name: [glat]
column.summary: galactic latitude, rounded to 0.001 deg

column.name: [x_scan]
column.summary: mean cross-scan focal plane position of the source in the U-scan coordinate system

column.name: [jdate]
column.summary: Julian Date of the source measurement accurate to +-30 seconds

column.name: [j_psfchi]
column.summary: J band reduced chi-squared value of fit

column.name: [h_psfchi]
column.summary: H band reduced chi-squared value of fit

column.name: [k_psfchi]
column.summary: K band reduced chi-squared value of fit

column.name: [j_m_stdap]
column.summary: J standard aperture magnitude or BF aperture-photometry mag

column.name: [j_msig_stdap]
column.summary: J standard ap. mag/BF ap.-photometry mag uncertainty

column.name: [h_m_stdap]
column.summary: H standard aperture magnitude or BF aperture-photometry mag

column.name: [h_msig_stdap]
column.summary: H standard ap. mag/BF ap.-photometry mag uncertainty

column.name: [k_m_stdap]
column.summary: K standard aperture magnitude or BF aperture-photometry mag

column.name: [k_msig_stdap]
column.summary: K standard ap. mag/BF ap.-photometry mag uncertainty

column.name: [dist_edge_ns]
column.summary: distance from the source to the nearest North or South scan edge

column.name: [dist_edge_ew]
column.summary: distance from the source to the nearest East or West scan edge

column.name: [dist_edge_flg]
column.summary: two character flag that specifies to which scan edges a source lies closest

column.name: [dup_src]
column.summary: duplicate source flag

column.name: [use_src]
column.summary: use source flag

column.name: [a]
column.summary: catalog identifier of an optical source from either the Tycho 2 or USNO-A2.0 catalog

column.name: [dist_opt]
column.summary: distance in arcsec relative to associated optical source

column.name: [phi_opt]
column.summary: position angle relative to assocaited optical source

column.name: [b_m_opt]
column.summary: catalog blue mag of associated optical source

column.name: [vr_m_opt]
column.summary: catalog red magnitude of the associated optical source

column.name: [nopt_mchs]
column.summary: number of optical sources within 5 arcsec of 2MASS src

column.name: [ext_key]
column.summary: unique identification number of the record in the XSC that corresponds to this point source

column.name: [scan_key]
column.summary: unique identification number of the record in the Scan Information Table

column.name: [coadd_key]
column.summary: unique identification number of the record in the Atlas Image Data Table

column.name: [coadd]
column.summary: sequence number of the Atlas Image in which the position of this source falls

column.name: [j_h]
column.summary: default J-H mag color

column.name: [h_k]
column.summary: default H-K mag color

column.name: [j_k]
column.summary: default J-K mag color

column.name: [jdate]
column.summary: Julian Date of the source measurement accurate to +30 seconds. (See 2MASS PSC documentation).

column.name: [designation]
column.summary: Sexagesimal, equatorial position-based source name in the form: hhmmssss+ddmmsss[ABC...].

column.name: [sup_ra]
column.summary: Super-coadd centroid RA (J2000 decimal deg).

column.name: [sup_dec]
column.summary: Super-coadd centroid Dec (J2000 decimal deg).

column.name: [density]
column.summary: Coadd log(density) of stars with k<14 mag.

column.name: [r_k20fe]
column.summary: 20mag/sq arcsec isophotal K fiducial ell. ap. semi-major axis.

column.name: [j_m_k20fe]
column.summary: J 20mag/sq arcsec isophotal fiducial ell. ap. magnitude.

column.name: [j_msig_k20fe]
column.summary: J 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq arcsec iso.fid.ell.mag.

column.name: [j_flg_k20fe]
column.summary: J confusion flag for 20mag/sq arcsec iso. fid. ell. mag.

column.name: [h_m_k20fe]
column.summary: H 20mag/sq arcsec isophotal fiducial ell. ap. magnitude.

column.name: [h_msig_k20fe]
column.summary: H 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq arcsec iso.fid.ell.mag.

column.name: [h_flg_k20fe]
column.summary: H confusion flag for 20mag/sq arcsec iso. fid. ell. mag.

column.name: [k_m_k20fe]
column.summary: K 20mag/sq arcsec isophotal fiducial ell. ap. magnitude.

column.name: [k_msig_k20fe]
column.summary: K 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq arcsec iso.fid.ell.mag.

column.name: [k_flg_k20fe]
column.summary: K confusion flag for 20mag/sq arcsec iso. fid. ell. mag.

column.name: [r_3sig]
column.summary: 3-sigma K isophotal semi-major axis.

column.name: [j_ba]
column.summary: J minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: [j_phi]
column.summary: J angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [h_phi]
column.summary: H angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [k_ba]
column.summary: K minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: [k_phi]
column.summary: K angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [sup_r_3sig]
column.summary: Super-coadd minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: [sup_ba]
column.summary: K minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: [sup_phi]
column.summary: K angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [r_fe]
column.summary: K fiducial Kron elliptical aperture semi-major axis.

column.name: [j_m_fe]
column.summary: J fiducial Kron elliptical aperture magnitude.

column.name: [j_msig_fe]
column.summary: J 1-sigma uncertainty in fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: [j_flg_fe]
column.summary: J confusion flag for fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: [h_m_fe]
column.summary: H fiducial Kron elliptical aperture magnitude.

column.name: [h_msig_fe]
column.summary: H 1-sigma uncertainty in fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: [h_flg_fe]
column.summary: H confusion flag for fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: [k_m_fe]
column.summary: K fiducial Kron elliptical aperture magnitude.

column.name: [k_msig_fe]
column.summary: K 1-sigma uncertainty in fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: [k_flg_fe]
column.summary: K confusion flag for fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: [r_ext]
column.summary: extrapolation/total radius.

column.name: [j_m_ext]
column.summary: J mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: [j_msig_ext]
column.summary: J 1-sigma uncertainty in mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: [j_pchi]
column.summary: J chi^2 of fit to rad. profile

column.name: [h_m_ext]
column.summary: H mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: [h_msig_ext]
column.summary: H 1-sigma uncertainty in mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: [h_pchi]
column.summary: H chi^2 of fit to rad. profile

column.name: [k_m_ext]
column.summary: K mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: [k_msig_ext]
column.summary: K 1-sigma uncertainty in mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: [k_pchi]
column.summary: K chi^2 of fit to rad. profile

column.name: [j_r_eff]
column.summary: J half-light (integrated half-flux point) radius.

column.name: [j_mnsurfb_eff]
column.summary: J mean surface brightness at the half-light radius.

column.name: [h_r_eff]
column.summary: H half-light (integrated half-flux point) radius.

column.name: [h_mnsurfb_eff]
column.summary: H mean surface brightness at the half-light radius.

column.name: [k_r_eff]
column.summary: K half-light (integrated half-flux point) radius.

column.name: [k_mnsurfb_eff]
column.summary: K mean surface brightness at the half-light radius.

column.name: [j_con_indx]
column.summary: J concentration index r_75%/r_25%.

column.name: [h_con_indx]
column.summary: H concentration index r_75%/r_25%.

column.name: [k_con_indx]
column.summary: K concentration index r_75%/r_25%.

column.name: [j_peak]
column.summary: J peak pixel brightness.

column.name: [h_peak]
column.summary: H peak pixel brightness.

column.name: [k_peak]
column.summary: K peak pixel brightness.

column.name: [j_5surf]
column.summary: J central surface brightness (r<=5).

column.name: [h_5surf]
column.summary: H central surface brightness (r<=5).

column.name: [k_5surf]
column.summary: K central surface brightness (r<=5).

column.name: [e_score]
column.summary: extended score: 1(extended) < e_score < 2(point-like).

column.name: [g_score]
column.summary: galaxy score: 1(extended) < g_score < 2(point-like).

column.name: [vc]
column.summary: visual verification score for source.

column.name: [cc_flg]
column.summary: indicates artifact contamination and/or confusion.

column.name: [im_nx]
column.summary: size of postage stamp image in pixels.

column.name: [r_k20fc]
column.summary: 20mag/sq arcsec isophotal K fiducial circular ap. radius.

column.name: [j_m_k20fc]
column.summary: J 20mag/sq arcsec isophotal fiducial circ. ap. mag.

column.name: [j_msig_k20fc]
column.summary: J 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq arcsec iso.fid.circ. mag.

column.name: [j_flg_k20fc]

column.name: [k_flg_k20fc]
column.summary: K confusion flag for 20mag/sq arcsec iso. fid. circ. mag.

column.summary: K system photometry magnitude.

column.name: [k_msig_sys]
column.summary: K 1-sigma uncertainty in system photometry mag.

column.name: [sys_flg]
column.summary: system flag: 0=no system, 1=nearby galaxy flux incl. in mag.

column.name: [contam_flg]
column.summary: contamination flag: 0=no stars, 1=stellar flux incl. in mag.

column.name: [j_5sig_ba]
column.summary: J minor/major axis ratio fit to the 5-sigma isophote.

column.name: [j_5sig_phi]
column.summary: J angle to 5-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [h_5sig_ba]
column.summary: H minor/major axis ratio fit to the 5-sigma isophote.

column.name: [h_5sig_phi]
column.summary: H angle to 5-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [k_5sig_ba]
column.summary: K minor/major axis ratio fit to the 5-sigma isophote.

column.name: [k_5sig_phi]
column.summary: K angle to 5-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: [j_d_area]
column.summary: J 5-sigma to 3-sigma differential area.

column.name: [j_perc_darea]
column.summary: J 5-sigma to 3-sigma percent area change.

column.name: [h_d_area]
column.summary: H 5-sigma to 3-sigma differential area.

column.name: [h_perc_darea]
column.summary: H 5-sigma to 3-sigma percent area change.

column.name: [k_d_area]
column.summary: K 5-sigma to 3-sigma differential area.

column.name: [k_perc_darea]
column.summary: K 5-sigma to 3-sigma percent area change.

column.name: [j_bisym_rat]
column.summary: J bi-symmetric flux ratio.

column.name: [j_bisym_chi]
column.summary: J bi-symmetric cross-correlation chi.

column.name: [h_bisym_rat]
column.summary: H bi-symmetric flux ratio.

column.name: [h_bisym_chi]
column.summary: K bi-symmetric flux ratio.

column.name: [k_bisym_rat]
column.summary: K bi-symmetric flux ratio.

column.name: [k_bisym_chi]
column.summary: K bi-symmetric cross-correlation chi.

column.name: [j_sh0]
column.summary: J ridge shape (LCSB: BSNR limit).

column.name: [j_sig_sh0]
column.summary: J ridge shape sigma (LCSB: B2SNR limit).

column.name: [h_sh0]
column.summary: H ridge shape (LCSB: BSNR limit).

column.name: [h_sig_sh0]
column.summary: H ridge shape sigma (LCSB: B2SNR limit).

column.name: [k_sh0]
column.summary: K ridge shape (LCSB: BSNR limit).

column.name: [k_sig_sh0]
column.summary: K ridge shape sigma (LCSB: B2SNR limit).

column.name: [j_sc_mxdn]
column.summary: J mxdn (score) (LCSB: BSNR - block/smoothed SNR)

column.name: [j_sc_sh]
column.summary: J shape (score).

column.name: [j_sc_wsh]
column.summary: J wsh (score) (LCSB: PSNR - peak raw SNR).

column.name: [j_sc_r23]
column.summary: J r23 (score) (LCSB: TSNR - integrated SNR for r=15).

column.name: [j_sc_1mm]
column.summary: J 1st moment (score) (LCSB: super blk 2,4,8 SNR).

column.name: [j_sc_2mm]
column.summary: J 2nd moment (score) (LCSB: SNRMAX - super SNR max).

column.name: [j_sc_vint]
column.summary: J vint (score).

column.name: [j_sc_r1]
column.summary: J r1 (score).

column.name: [j_sc_msh]
column.summary: J median shape score.

column.name: [h_sc_mxdn]
column.summary: H mxdn (score) (LCSB: BSNR - block/smoothed SNR)

column.name: [h_sc_sh]

column.name: [j_chif_ellf]
column.summary: J % chi-fraction for elliptical fit to 3-sig isophote.

column.name: [k_chif_ellf]
column.summary: K % chi-fraction for elliptical fit to 3-sig isophote.

column.name: [ellfit_flg]
column.summary: ellipse fitting contamination flag.

column.name: [sup_chif_ellf]
column.summary: super-coadd % chi-fraction for ellip. fit to 3-sig isophote.

column.name: [n_blank]
column.summary: number of blanked source records.

column.name: [n_sub]
column.summary: number of subtracted source records.

column.name: [bl_sub_flg]
column.summary: blanked/subtracted src description flag.

column.name: [id_flg]
column.summary: type/galaxy ID flag (0=non-catalog, 1=catalog, 2=LCSB).

column.name: [id_cat]
column.summary: matched galaxy catalog name.

column.name: [fg_flg]
column.summary: flux-growth convergence flag.

column.name: [blk_fac]
column.summary: LCSB blocking factor (1, 2, 4, 8).

column.name: [dup_src]
column.summary: Duplicate source flag.

column.name: [use_src]
column.summary: Use source flag.

column.name: [prox]
column.summary: Proximity. The distance between this source and its nearest neighbor in the PSC.

column.name: [pxpa]
column.summary: The position angle on the sky of the vector from the source to the nearest neighbor in the PSC, East of North.

column.name: [pxcntr]
column.summary: ext_key value of nearest XSC source.

column.name: [dist_edge_ns]
column.summary: The distance from the source to the nearest North or South scan edge.

column.name: [dist_edge_ew]
column.summary: The distance from the source to the nearest East or West scan edge.

column.name: [dist_edge_flg]
column.summary: flag indicating which edges ([n|s][e|w]) are nearest to src.

column.name: [pts_key]
column.summary: key to point source data DB record.

column.name: [mp_key]
column.summary: key to minor planet prediction DB record.

column.name: [night_key]
column.summary: key to night data record in "scan DB".

column.name: [scan_key]
column.summary: key to scan data record in "scan DB".

column.name: [coadd_key]
column.summary: key to coadd data record in "scan DB".

column.name: [hemis]
column.summary: hemisphere (N/S) of observation. "n" = North/Mt. Hopkins; "s" = South/CTIO.

column.name: [date]
column.summary: The observation reference date for this source expressed in ISO standard format.

column.name: [scan]
column.summary: scan number (unique within date).

column.name: [coadd]
column.summary: 3-digit coadd number (unique within scan).

column.name: [x_coadd]
column.summary: x (cross-scan) position (coadd coord.).

column.name: [y_coadd]
column.summary: y (in-scan) position (coadd coord.).

column.name: [j_subst2]
column.summary: J residual background #2 (score).

column.name: [h_subst2]
column.summary: H residual background #2 (score).

column.name: [k_subst2]
column.summary: K residual background #2 (score).

column.name: [j_back]
column.summary: J coadd median background.

column.name: [h_back]
column.summary: H coadd median background

column.name: [k_back]
column.summary: K coadd median background.

column.name: [j_resid_ann]
column.summary: J residual annulus background median.

column.name: [h_resid_ann]
column.summary: H residual annulus background median.

column.name: [k_resid_ann]
column.summary: K residual annulus background median.

column.name: [j_bndg_per]
column.summary: J banding Fourier Transf. period on this side of coadd.

column.name: [j_bndg_amp]
column.summary: J banding maximum FT amplitude on this side of coadd.

column.name: [h_bndg_per]
column.summary: H banding Fourier Transf. period on this side of coadd.

column.name: [h_bndg_amp]
column.summary: H banding maximum FT amplitude on this side of coadd.

column.name: [k_bndg_per]
column.summary: K banding Fourier Transf. period on this side of coadd.

column.name: [k_bndg_amp]
column.summary: K banding maximum FT amplitude on this side of coadd.

column.name: [j_seetrack]
column.summary: J band seetracking score.

column.name: [h_seetrack]
column.summary: H band seetracking score.

column.name: [k_seetrack]
column.summary: K band seetracking score.

column.name: [ext_key]
column.summary: entry counter (key) number (unique within table).

column.name: [scan_key]
column.summary: The unique identification number for this scan

column.name: [hemis]
column.summary: Observatory from which data were obtained (n/s)

column.name: [date]
column.summary: The observation reference date for this scan expressed in ISO standard format

column.name: [scan]
column.summary: Scan number (unique within date)

column.name: [tile]
column.summary: Tile identification number

column.name: [ra]
column.summary: Right ascension of scan center for equinox J2000

column.name: [dec]
column.summary: Declination of scan center for equinox J2000

column.name: [glon]
column.summary: Galactic longitude of scan center, as computed from ra and dec

column.name: [glat]
column.summary: Galactic latitude of scan center, as computed from ra and dec

column.name: [ra_1]
column.summary: J2000 right ascension of the eastern corner at start of scan

column.name: [dec_1]
column.summary: J2000 declination of the eastern corner at start of scan

column.name: [ra_2]
column.summary: J2000 right ascension of the western corner at start of s

column.name: [dec_2]
column.summary: J2000 declination of the western corner at start of scan

column.name: [ra_3]
column.summary: J2000 right ascension of the eastern corner at end of scan

column.name: [dec_3]
column.summary: J2000 declination of the eastern corner at end of scan

column.name: [ra_4]
column.summary: J2000 right ascension of the western corner at end of scan

column.name: [dec_4]
column.summary: J2000 declination of the western corner at end of scan

column.name: [sd]
column.summary: Scanning direction (north-going or south-going)

column.name: [qual]
column.summary: Quality score for scan (10 is highest grade,0 is lowest)

column.name: [hgl]
column.summary: flag indicating whether(1) or not(0) the scan has a single-frame H-band electronic glitch

column.name: [cld]
column.summary: flag indicating whether or not a cloud was found in the scan after comparison (1 indicates clouds)

column.name: [xph]
column.summary: flag indicating whether(1) or not(0) another photometric problem, not obviously cloud related, was found

column.name: [anom]
column.summary: flag indicating whether(1) or not(0) an unusual problem was found in the Atlas Images for this scan

column.name: [ut]
column.summary: Universal Time (UT) at beginning of scan

column.name: [jdate]
column.summary: Julian Date at beginning of scan

column.name: [airm]
column.summary: Airmass at beginning of scan

column.name: [zd]
column.summary: Scan's distance from the zenith at beginning of scan

column.name: [ha]
column.summary: Hour angle at beginning of scan

column.name: [rh]
column.summary: Relative humidity of telescope enclosure at beginning of scan

column.name: [air_temp]
column.summary: Air temperature at beginning of scan

column.name: [tel_temp]
column.summary: Telescope girdle temperature at beginning of scan

column.name: [focus]
column.summary: Focus setting of telescope at beginning of scan

column.name: [hry]
column.summary: Flag indicating the H-band array configuration for the camera (1 indicates the new configuration)

column.name: [c_strat]
column.summary: Flag indicating the calibration strategy for this night's data

column.name: [j_zp_ap]
column.summary: Photometric zero-point for J-band aperture photometry

column.name: [h_zp_ap]
column.summary: Photometric zero-point for H-band aperture photometry

column.name: [k_zp_ap]
column.summary: Photometric zero-point for Ks-band aperture photometry

column.name: [h_zperr_ap]
column.summary: RMS-error of zero-point for H-band aperture photometry

column.name: [k_zperr_ap]
column.summary: RMS-error of zero-point for Ks-band aperture photometry

column.name: [j_n_snr10]
column.summary: Number of point sources at J-band with SNR>10 (instrumental mag <=15.8)

column.name: [h_n_snr10]
column.summary: Number of point sources at H-band with SNR>10 (instrumental mag <=15.1)

column.name: [k_n_snr10]
column.summary: Number of point sources at Ks-band with SNR>10 (instrumental mag <=14.3)

column.name: [n_ext]
column.summary: Number of regular extended sources detected in scan

column.name: [j_shape_avg]
column.summary: J-band average seeing shape for scan

column.name: [h_shape_avg]
column.summary: H-band average seeing shape for scan

column.name: [k_shape_avg]
column.summary: Ks-band average seeing shape for scan

column.name: [j_shape_rms]
column.summary: RMS-error of J-band average seeing shape

column.name: [h_shape_rms]
column.summary: RMS-error of H-band average seeing shape

column.name: [k_shape_rms]
column.summary: RMS-error of Ks-band average seeing shape

column.name: [j_2mrat]
column.summary: J-band average 2nd image moment ratio

column.name: [h_2mrat]
column.summary: H-band average 2nd image moment ratio

column.name: [k_2mrat]
column.summary: Ks-band average 2nd image moment ratio

column.name: [j_psp]
column.summary: J-band photometric sensitivity paramater (PSP).

column.name: [h_psp]
column.summary: H-band photometric sensitivity parameter (PSP).

column.name: [k_psp]
column.summary: Ks-band photometric sensitivity parameter (PSP).

column.name: [j_pts_noise]
column.summary: log10 of the mode of the noise distribution (noise estimated from J-band)

column.name: [h_pts_noise]
column.summary: log10 of the mode of the noise distribution (noise estimated from H-band)

column.name: [k_pts_noise]
column.summary: log10 of the mode of the noise distribution (noise estimated from Ks-band)

column.name: [j_msnr10]
column.summary: The J-band magnitude at which SNR=10 is achieved for this scan

column.name: [h_msnr10]
column.summary: The H-band magnitude at which SNR=10 is achieved for this scan

column.name: [k_msnr10]
column.summary: The Ks-band magnitude at which SNR=10 is achieved for this scan

column.name: [rel0]
column.summary: Flag indicating whether the scan is contained in the 2MASS Sampler Release

column.name: [rel1]
column.summary: Flag indicating whether the scan is contained in the 2MASS First Incremental Data Release (IDR1)

column.name: [rel2]
column.summary: Flag indicating whether the scan is contained in the 2MASS Second Incremental Data Release (IDR2)
